column4: hi, new noob here so please be gentle, im trying to setup samba so i can access some windows shares and when i try to save the edited samba config file it says permission denied but im the only user on the system.  so what do i do to fix this (im sure simple for you lot lol) issue?
trying to save anything in etc i get permission denied
you need to edit the file as root so need to use "sudo" to launch the editor of "gksudo" if it is a graphical editor
